camel.source.endpoint.amazonSWClient.name: camel.source.endpoint.amazonSWClient
camel.source.endpoint.amazonSWClient.description: To use the given AmazonSimpleWorkflowClient as client

camel.source.endpoint.dataConverter.name: camel.source.endpoint.dataConverter
camel.source.endpoint.dataConverter.description: An instance of com.amazonaws.services.simpleworkflow.flow.DataConverter to use for serializing/deserializing the data.

camel.source.endpoint.eventName.name: camel.source.endpoint.eventName
camel.source.endpoint.eventName.description: The workflow or activity event name to use.

camel.source.endpoint.region.name: camel.source.endpoint.region
camel.source.endpoint.region.description: Amazon AWS Region. When using this parameter, the configuration will expect the capitalized name of the region (for example AP_EAST_1) You'll need to use the name Regions.EU_WEST_1.name()

camel.source.endpoint.version.name: camel.source.endpoint.version
camel.source.endpoint.version.description: The workflow or activity event version to use.

camel.source.endpoint.bridgeErrorHandler.name: camel.source.endpoint.bridgeErrorHandler
camel.source.endpoint.bridgeErrorHandler.description: Allows for bridging the consumer to the Camel routing Error Handler, which mean any exceptions occurred while the consumer is trying to pickup incoming messages, or the likes, will now be processed as a message and handled by the routing Error Handler. By default the consumer will use the org.apache.camel.spi.ExceptionHandler to deal with exceptions, that will be logged at WARN or ERROR level and ignored.

camel.source.endpoint.exceptionHandler.name: camel.source.endpoint.exceptionHandler
camel.source.endpoint.exceptionHandler.description: To let the consumer use a custom ExceptionHandler. Notice if the option bridgeErrorHandler is enabled then this option is not in use. By default the consumer will deal with exceptions, that will be logged at WARN or ERROR level and ignored.

camel.source.endpoint.exchangePattern.name: camel.source.endpoint.exchangePattern
camel.source.endpoint.exchangePattern.description: Sets the exchange pattern when the consumer creates an exchange. One of: [InOnly] [InOut] [InOptionalOut]

camel.source.endpoint.activityList.name: camel.source.endpoint.activityList
camel.source.endpoint.activityList.description: The list name to consume activities from.

camel.source.endpoint.activityThreadPool.name: camel.source.endpoint.activityThreadPoolSize
camel.source.endpoint.activityThreadPool.description: Maximum number of threads in work pool for activity.

camel.source.endpoint.basicPropertyBindi.name: camel.source.endpoint.basicPropertyBinding
camel.source.endpoint.basicPropertyBindi.description: Whether the endpoint should use basic property binding (Camel 2.x) or the newer property binding with additional capabilities

camel.source.endpoint.clientConfiguratio.name: camel.source.endpoint.clientConfigurationParameters
camel.source.endpoint.clientConfiguratio.description: To configure the ClientConfiguration using the key/values from the Map.

camel.source.endpoint.startWorkflowOptio.name: camel.source.endpoint.startWorkflowOptionsParameters
camel.source.endpoint.startWorkflowOptio.description: To configure the StartWorkflowOptions using the key/values from the Map.

camel.source.endpoint.sWClientParameters.name: camel.source.endpoint.sWClientParameters
camel.source.endpoint.sWClientParameters.description: To configure the AmazonSimpleWorkflowClient using the key/values from the Map.

camel.source.endpoint.synchronous.name: camel.source.endpoint.synchronous
camel.source.endpoint.synchronous.description: Sets whether synchronous processing should be strictly used, or Camel is allowed to use asynchronous processing (if supported).

camel.source.endpoint.workflowList.name: camel.source.endpoint.workflowList
camel.source.endpoint.workflowList.description: The list name to consume workflows from.

camel.component.aws-swf.amazonSWClient.name: camel.component.aws-swf.amazonSWClient
camel.component.aws-swf.amazonSWClient.description: To use the given AmazonSimpleWorkflowClient as client

camel.component.aws-swf.dataConverter.name: camel.component.aws-swf.dataConverter
camel.component.aws-swf.dataConverter.description: An instance of com.amazonaws.services.simpleworkflow.flow.DataConverter to use for serializing/deserializing the data.

camel.component.aws-swf.eventName.name: camel.component.aws-swf.eventName
camel.component.aws-swf.eventName.description: The workflow or activity event name to use.

camel.component.aws-swf.region.name: camel.component.aws-swf.region
camel.component.aws-swf.region.description: Amazon AWS Region. When using this parameter, the configuration will expect the capitalized name of the region (for example AP_EAST_1) You'll need to use the name Regions.EU_WEST_1.name()

camel.component.aws-swf.version.name: camel.component.aws-swf.version
camel.component.aws-swf.version.description: The workflow or activity event version to use.

camel.component.aws-swf.bridgeErrorHandl.name: camel.component.aws-swf.bridgeErrorHandler
camel.component.aws-swf.bridgeErrorHandl.description: Allows for bridging the consumer to the Camel routing Error Handler, which mean any exceptions occurred while the consumer is trying to pickup incoming messages, or the likes, will now be processed as a message and handled by the routing Error Handler. By default the consumer will use the org.apache.camel.spi.ExceptionHandler to deal with exceptions, that will be logged at WARN or ERROR level and ignored.

camel.component.aws-swf.activityList.name: camel.component.aws-swf.activityList
camel.component.aws-swf.activityList.description: The list name to consume activities from.

camel.component.aws-swf.activityThreadPo.name: camel.component.aws-swf.activityThreadPoolSize
camel.component.aws-swf.activityThreadPo.description: Maximum number of threads in work pool for activity.

camel.component.aws-swf.basicPropertyBin.name: camel.component.aws-swf.basicPropertyBinding
camel.component.aws-swf.basicPropertyBin.description: Whether the component should use basic property binding (Camel 2.x) or the newer property binding with additional capabilities

camel.component.aws-swf.clientConfigurat.name: camel.component.aws-swf.clientConfigurationParameters
camel.component.aws-swf.clientConfigurat.description: To configure the ClientConfiguration using the key/values from the Map.

camel.component.aws-swf.startWorkflowOpt.name: camel.component.aws-swf.startWorkflowOptionsParameters
camel.component.aws-swf.startWorkflowOpt.description: To configure the StartWorkflowOptions using the key/values from the Map.

camel.component.aws-swf.sWClientParamete.name: camel.component.aws-swf.sWClientParameters
camel.component.aws-swf.sWClientParamete.description: To configure the AmazonSimpleWorkflowClient using the key/values from the Map.

camel.component.aws-swf.workflowList.name: camel.component.aws-swf.workflowList
camel.component.aws-swf.workflowList.description: The list name to consume workflows from.
